name: The Battle Of Ages
description:
The Battle of Ages is an online shooter where there are characters from different ages.
The characters fight with each other with help of magic or common weapon.
One game can have a lot off players.
The game is divided into matches 25 minutes each or until one of the players kills 50 people.
Each player has their own skills which can be improved during the match.
There is a system of clans. The map is big and various.
You will get a lot off positive emotions and lift your spirits.
